metadata.synopsis: Auntie Ethel, disguised as Quenora Grizly. Complaining about being hungover.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Get to Blushing Mermaid bar area upper floor, -117.322; 24.14; -90.224

1.text: Unless the 'Maid is on fire, shove off.

0.text: Actually, just leave me to burn - bloody hangover.
0.context: NodeContext: hungover, annoyed at her stomach
